definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: The donkey helped them pull the field plow during sowing season and carry them to the market.
sentences.chinese: 這頭驢平時幫他們種地拉磨，趕集時還要作腳力。

sentences.english: I knew how to farm already.
sentences.chinese: 我當時已經知道如何種地了。

sentences.english: To get anywhere, you need to be constructive. You have to make an effort.
sentences.chinese: 不論走到何種地步，都要積極籌劃，付諸努力。

sentences.english: He has invested some of the income from his increased crops in a small pig farm.
sentences.chinese: 部分種地賺得的錢還投資辦了一個小型養豬場。

sentences.english: Dr. Yuan searched for a way to increase rice harvests without expanding the area of fields.
sentences.chinese: 袁博士在不擴大種地面積的基礎上尋求增收的途徑。

sentences.english: And thrifty farmers, as they tilled the earth.
sentences.chinese: 簡樸的農夫正忙着耕田種地。

sentences.english: Ezri son of Kelub was in charge of the field workers who farmed the land.
sentences.chinese: 掌管耕田種地的是基綠的兒子以斯利。

definition: to go to town/to enter a big city (to live or work)
to live one's life/to make a living
to seek one's livelihood/to work to support oneself/to earn a living
